title: please help me fix this!
body: So due to my play button being grayed out on the new client I've been using the legacy client, now that they have pulled the legacy client i decided to try and fix the new client and decided to reinstall the game entirely however when my install gets to the "Upgrading your client" section in continuously fails saying there's has been an error please check logs, I've googled around and don't really want to ruin this anymore then it could be, please help me i just want to play league again

replies.body:
No worries, I can help!  In this case, it's possible that the patcher isn't able to locate the file needed to boot up the update.  Try the following steps to repair that portion of your directory.

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)
- Scroll down until you find "LeagueClient.exe" and delete the file.
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
- Repair the client by selecting the “?” button in the top right-hand corner of the Patcher window (the first window that appears) and under the options menu, select Repair.

Let me know if this helps.
